mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_LOGIN_ID = #{id} AND ADMIN_PASSWORD = #{pwd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_INFO WHERE MEMBER_DELETED_DTM IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SB_TRADE_INFO WHERE DEL_DTM IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_CLUB WHERE BOOK_CLUB_DELETED_DT IS NULL

SELECT * FROM MEMBER_INFO WHERE MEMBER_DELETED_DTM IS NULL
AND MEMBER_ST = #{status}::member_st_enum
AND MEMBER_NICKNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (MEMBER_NICKNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY CRT_DTM DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT trade_seq, sale_title, sale_price, sale_rg, sale_st, book_title, crt_dtm FROM SB_TRADE_INFO WHERE DEL_DTM IS NULL
AND SALE_ST = #{status}::sale_st_enum
AND (SALE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR BOOK_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY CRT_DTM DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT BOOK_CLUB_SEQ, BOOK_CLUB_NAME, BOOK_CLUB_RG, BOOK_CLUB_MAX_MEMBER, BOOK_CLUB_SCHEDULE, CRT_DTM FROM BOOK_CLUB WHERE BOOK_CLUB_DELETED_DT IS NULL
AND BOOK_CLUB_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY CRT_DTM DESC LIMIT 50
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_INFO SET MEMBER_ST = #{status}::member_st_enum WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE MEMBER_INFO SET MEMBER_DELETED_DTM = NOW() WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE SB_TRADE_INFO SET SALE_ST = #{status}::sale_st_enum WHERE TRADE_SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE SB_TRADE_INFO SET DEL_DTM = NOW() WHERE TRADE_SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE BOOK_CLUB SET BOOK_CLUB_DELETED_DT = CURRENT_DATE WHERE BOOK_CLUB_SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT to_char(crt_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as date, COUNT(*) as count FROM MEMBER_INFO WHERE crt_dtm >= current_date - interval '6 days' GROUP BY to_char(crt_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY date
SELECT to_char(crt_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as date, COUNT(*) as count FROM SB_TRADE_INFO WHERE crt_dtm >= current_date - interval '6 days' GROUP BY to_char(crt_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY date

SELECT c.category_nm as name, COUNT(t.trade_seq) as count FROM category c JOIN sb_trade_info t ON c.category_seq = t.category_seq WHERE t.del_dtm IS NULL GROUP BY c.category_nm ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MEMBER_INFO WHERE MEMBER_DELETED_DTM IS NULL ORDER BY CRT_DTM DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT trade_seq, sale_title, sale_price, sale_rg, sale_st, book_title, crt_dtm FROM SB_TRADE_INFO WHERE DEL_DTM IS NULL ORDER BY CRT_DTM DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT BOOK_CLUB_SEQ, BOOK_CLUB_NAME, BOOK_CLUB_RG, BOOK_CLUB_MAX_MEMBER, BOOK_CLUB_SCHEDULE, CRT_DTM FROM BOOK_CLUB WHERE BOOK_CLUB_DELETED_DT IS NULL ORDER BY CRT_DTM DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT L.LOGIN_INFO_SEQ , L.MEMBER_SEQ , L.LOGIN_DTM , L.LOGIN_IP , L.LOGOUT_DTM , L.LOGOUT_IP , M.MEMBER_NICKNM , M.MEMBER_EMAIL FROM LOGIN_INFO L INNER JOIN MEMBER_INFO M ON L.MEMBER_SEQ = M.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE L.MEMBER_SEQ IS NOT NULL ORDER BY L.LOGIN_DTM DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT L.LOGIN_INFO_SEQ , L.ADMIN_SEQ , L.LOGIN_DTM , L.LOGIN_IP , L.LOGOUT_DTM , L.LOGOUT_IP , A.ADMIN_LOGIN_ID FROM LOGIN_INFO L INNER JOIN ADMIN A ON L.ADMIN_SEQ = A.ADMIN_SEQ WHERE L.ADMIN_SEQ IS NOT NULL ORDER BY L.LOGIN_DTM DESC LIMIT 100
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGIN_INFO (ADMIN_SEQ, LOGIN_DTM, LOGIN_IP) VALUES (#{admin_seq}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{login_ip})
mapper.update: UPDATE LOGIN_INFO SET LOGOUT_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , LOGOUT_IP = #{logout_ip} WHERE LOGIN_INFO_SEQ = ( SELECT LOGIN_INFO_SEQ FROM LOGIN_INFO WHERE ADMIN_SEQ = #{admin_seq} AND LOGOUT_DTM IS NULL ORDER BY LOGIN_DTM DESC LIMIT 1 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGIN_INFO (MEMBER_SEQ, LOGIN_DTM, LOGIN_IP) VALUES (#{member_seq}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{login_ip})
mapper.update: UPDATE LOGIN_INFO SET LOGOUT_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , LOGOUT_IP = #{logout_ip} WHERE LOGIN_INFO_SEQ = ( SELECT LOGIN_INFO_SEQ FROM LOGIN_INFO WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} AND LOGOUT_DTM IS NULL ORDER BY LOGIN_DTM DESC LIMIT 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BANNER WHERE IS_ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY ORDER_IDX ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BANNER (TITLE, SUBTITLE, BG_COLOR_FROM, BG_COLOR_TO, BTN_TEXT, BTN_LINK, ICON_NAME, ORDER_IDX) VALUES (#{title}, #{subtitle}, #{bgColorFrom}, #{bgColorTo}, #{btnText}, #{btnLink}, #{iconName}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(ORDER_IDX), 0) + 1 FROM BANNER))
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_SEQ , N.ADMIN_SEQ , N.NOTICE_TITLE , N.NOTICE_PRIORITY , N.ACTIVE , N.VIEW_COUNT , N.NOTICE_CONT , N.CRT_DTM , A.ADMIN_LOGIN_ID FROM NOTICE N LEFT JOIN ADMIN A ON N.ADMIN_SEQ = A.ADMIN_SEQ ORDER BY N.NOTICE_PRIORITY DESC, N.CRT_DTM DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT N.NOTICE_SEQ , N.ADMIN_SEQ , N.NOTICE_TITLE , N.NOTICE_PRIORITY , N.ACTIVE , N.VIEW_COUNT , N.NOTICE_CONT , N.CRT_DTM , A.ADMIN_LOGIN_ID FROM NOTICE N LEFT JOIN ADMIN A ON N.ADMIN_SEQ = A.ADMIN_SEQ WHERE N.NOTICE_SEQ = #{notice_seq}
